DOC.brief_summary: The purpose project compare `` usual care '' chronic low back disorder rural setting ( nurse practitioner/NP ) two different mean integrate Physical Therapy ( PT ) rural health care team : 1. in-person PT assessment , PT travel urban center 2. interprofessional Telehealth assessment local NP join PT via Telehealth . DOC.detailed_description: The study design include two intervention group control group 20 participant group : 1. interprofessional videoconferencing intervention , 2. in-person PT , 3 . `` usual-care '' provide NP . Due interprofessional nature intervention , NP involve telehealth-based intervention group may alter `` usual care '' practice ; therefore , control group participant draw practice 2 NPs involve Telehealth intervention provide service different clinic . Each PT NP alone complete standardize online diagnostic classification tool.Participants randomly assign one three group .
